title: Government amends legislation to improve the organisation and work of the police (Ministry of the ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of the Interior of the Republic of Slovenia ) 22. 10. 2015 Government amends legislation to improve the organisation and work of the police At today's session, the government approved the draft Act Amending the Police
